items.title: Happy Hour
items.description: 50% off cocktails and appetizers, Mon–Fri 4–6 PM
items.details: Join us Monday through Friday, 4–6 PM, for half-price cocktails and appetizers. Perfect for after-work drinks or a pre-dinner bite. Valid at the bar and lounge. Excludes holidays.

items.title: Date Night
items.description: Three-course dinner for two with wine pairing — $99
items.details: Our Date Night package includes a shared appetizer, two entrees, and a dessert to share. Sommelier-selected wine pairing included. Reservations recommended. Available Thursday–Saturday evenings.

items.title: Sunday Brunch
items.description: Bottomless mimosas with any brunch entrée — $25
items.details: Sundays 11 AM–3 PM. Choose any brunch entrée and enjoy bottomless mimosas for $25 per person. Eggs Benedict, avocado toast, pancakes, and more. Walk-ins welcome.
